meanings.definition: Ample space to move or work freely.
meanings.sent1: In the crowded bus, I wished for more elbowroom to stretch my arms.
meanings.sent2: The new office layout provides employees with enough elbowroom to collaborate effectively.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was dancing so close together, there was no elbowroom left!
meanings.sent4: After decluttering the living room, there was finally enough elbowroom to practice yoga.
meanings.sent5: The spacious park offered plenty of elbowroom for families to picnic and play.

meanings.definition: Freedom to act or think without restriction.
meanings.sent1: Having the elbowroom to make decisions independently is crucial for personal growth.
meanings.sent2: In a democratic society, citizens should have the elbowroom to express their opinions freely.
meanings.sent3: The strict rules at the library didn't leave much elbowroom for creativity.
meanings.sent4: With her parents away for the weekend, Sarah finally had the elbowroom to plan a surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The artist found inspiration in the vast desert, where there was endless elbowroom for imagination.
